item.title: Rune c'bow spec?
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

0wn3r k4t3:

whats the max it can hit

Uhmm, Around 35, unless your wearing void then it’s like 40. But it’s a low chance of hitting that high, it usually hits like 28-35 wearing void, and around 23-28 without void…Both with 99 range…But I want the spec to hit like 40 with spec…(No void.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2009, 08:37:47 pm[/size][hr]Bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2009, 08:38:17 pm[/size][hr]Bump?

item.title: Rune c'bow spec?
item.dc:creator: @SmDaRgOn SmDaRgOn
item.description:
@SmDaRgOn wrote:

Okay, I have been trying to code this for ages, I am trying to make my rune c’bow do more damage with a random special, I have the random special with GFX working fine, only that it doesn’t hit much damage…It’s hitting normally like it would without the special…I have searched google and these forums for a tutorial but I can’t find it anywhere…

Here is the code:

[code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837 && playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 881){
hitDiff = misc.random(55);
stillgfx(579, EnemyY, EnemyX);
}

Thanks for in future reference.[/code]

Read full topic
